ygData.subject: RE: [EverQuest] Lost in translation.
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi and welcome to the world of EQ.  Ok to link a wep all you do is go in your inventory and bring up your window that has the description of your wep.  After
ygData.messageBody:
Hi and welcome to the world of EQ. Ok to link a wep all you do is go in
your inventory and bring up your window that has the description of your
wep. After that left click (or right click can't remember) the icon of the
wep and it should bring up blue text that links the wep. You'll learn
something new everyday playing Everquest.

Bloodbrood Deathdisciple <Cealitus>
Shadowknight of the 30th Season

-----Original Message-----
From: family10 [mailto:family10@...]
Sent: Thursday, January 29, 2004 10:38 AM
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [EverQuest] Lost in translation.


Thanks to everyone for helping me to learn how to create and configure
spare chat screens. Now someone has thrown me another mystery to solve. A
player sent me the following words:
"Link your wep pls?"
Ok. I figured out that a wep is a weapon. When I asked him what he meant,
he said that he wanted to link with my hammer. I have an Intel's Hammer.
However, I have no idea what he means by linking him to it or how to do it.
Somebody please throw this poor newbe a clue. G. I'm playing a level 24 vah
shir shaman. Great goddess, there is something totally new to learn
everything I log on.

Edward Fox (Gunli on Luclin)
